Package org.apache.zookeeper.server.backup

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackupConfig
    Backup-related configurations.
    BackupConfig.Builder  
    BackupConfig.RestorationConfigBuilder  
    BackupFileInfo
    Metadata for a file that has been backed-up Assumes that the name of the backed up file uses the format: prefix.lowzxid-highzxid where prefix is one of the standard snap or log file prefixes, or "lostLog".
    BackupManager
    This class manages the backing up of txnlog and snap files to remote storage for longer term and durable retention than is possible on an ensemble server
    BackupManager.BackupFile
    Tracks a file that needs to be backed up, including temporary copies of the file
    BackupPoint
    Describes the point to which backups of log and snap files have been completed.
    BackupProcess
    Base class for the txnlog and snap backup, and timetable backup processes.
    BackupStatus
    Coordinate the backup status among processes local to a server; coordination across servers is better served via either an extension to the ZAB protocol or by some external mechanism.
    BackupSystemProperty
    System property Strings for ZooKeeper backup.
    BackupUtil
    Utility methods related to backups
    RestoreFromBackupTool
    This is a tool to restore, from backup storage, a snapshot and set of transaction log files that combine to represent a transactionally consistent image of a ZooKeeper ensemble at some zxid.
    SpotRestorationTool
    This is a tool for automatic zk path-based restoration of ZK data based on a zk node path using a collection of snapshot and transaction logs.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BackupUtil.BackupFileType
    Identifiers for the backup file types
    BackupUtil.IntervalEndpoint
    Identifiers for the two zxids in a backedup file name
    BackupUtil.SortOrder
    Identifiers for sort direction
    RestoreFromBackupTool.BackupStorageOption
